article.headline: Bed Bath & Beyond to close stores on Thanksgiving, unveil holiday plans
article.body: Bed Bath & Beyond Inc. BBBY, -1.37% said it will be closing its stores on Thanksgiving Day, joining other mass retailers, including Walmart Inc. WMT, +1.00% that will give workers the day off for the holiday. The home goods retailer also said it would soon announce plans for the holidays. Target Corp. TGT, +1.14% has already talked up its holiday plans, as retailers move quickly past back-to-school and get a jump on the big Christmas shopping season. Bed Bath & Beyond stock has slumped 37.5% for the year to date while the S&P 500 index SPX, +0.87% has gained 1.3% for the period.
